title: TERMINATE WINTER RYE COVER CROPS WITH THIS HACK!

tasks.task: Preparing a garden bed using winter rye cover crop as sheet mulch.
subtasks: Planting winter rye cover crop in the garden bed in September.
Allowing winter rye to grow through the winter without irrigation.
Timing the crimping of the winter rye before seed formation.
Securing T-posts with rope to create a crimping tool.
Crimping the winter rye using the constructed tool.
Covering the crimped area with a silage tarp to kill the cover crop.
Watering the tarp to aid in the termination process.
Adding compost and wood chips to improve soil quality and suppress weeds.
Preparing the bed for habanero pepper planting by measuring and straightening the rows.
Managing workers to assist with garden preparation and planting tasks.
